text: Ke timile yo bhannathandachau ki timi chadidi'inechau?, Hunata allahale ahilesam'ma timimadhye tiniharula'i pratisthita bana'eko chaina, jo mujahida (dharmayud'dha garne vyakti) chan ra jasale allaha, usako rasula ra mominharu baheka kasaila'i ghanista mitra bana'ena. Ra allaha timra sampurna kriyakalapabare jandacha
